alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:23PM EDT until July 08 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CALHOUN AND CENTRAL ORANGEBURG COUNTIES... At 423 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Orangeburg County Airport, or over Orangeburg, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, Branchville, Bowman, Elloree, Orangeburg County Airport, Claflin College, Edisto Gardens, South Carolina State University, Cameron, Rowesville, Cordova, Cope, Yonder Field, Wilkinson Heights, Prince of Orange Mall and Edisto. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 144 and 161. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways or walk through high water.
